text: Ladies' Man is a 1978 novel by Richard Price. Ladies' Man was Price's third novel. ==Overview== Kenny Becker, a young door-to-door salesman, goes on the prowl for love in 1970s New York City. ==References== Category:1978 American novels Category:Novels by Richard Price (writer) Category:Novels set in New York City Category:Houghton Mifflin books
title: Ladies' Man (novel)
